      Specified by:
      getPlayerByLogin in interface PlayerDAO
      Parameters:
      email_dni - email or dni of the player
      password - password of the player
      Returns:
      player that match with the email or dni or null if there is no player with that email or dni
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - in case there is no player with that email or dni
